title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish, the JAR creation fails and displays the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: When pressing finish in the JAR packager wizard with unsaved editors, the JAR creation fails and displays the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
EB: When pressing finish in the JAR packager wizard with unsaved editors, the JAR creation should not fail. Instead, a dialog should be displayed to allow the user to save the unsaved editors. After saving, the user should be able to continue creating the JAR without having to quit the wizard and re-enter all the fields again.
SR:
1. Open the JAR packager wizard.
2. Add some files to the JAR.
3. Do not save any of the opened files.
4. Press finish to create the JAR.
5. Observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.

Expected:
- A dialog should be displayed to allow saving the unsaved editors.
- After saving, the JAR creation should proceed without any issues.
